revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Teklogix |model=9150T Wireless Gateway |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country=Canada |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point,base station |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=IEC 60320 C14 |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac=true |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand= |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Lucent PC24E-H-ET |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Lucent |wi1_chip1_model=HERMES I |wi1_chip2_brand=Lucent |wi1_chip2_model=THESEUS HS |wi1_chip3_brand=Philips |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user=user |default_pass=123456 |oui= |oui_eth=00:C0:AF }} [http://community.psion.com/cfs-file.ashx/__key/communityserver-wikis-components-files/00-00-00-00-15/8053.80440g.pdf Manual]
Per the manual, there are two variants of this device.. *9150T - AC powered *9150DC - DC powered (barrel plug or PoE)
Per [http://www.currentdirections.com/pdfs/teklogix/specs/9150.pdf Teklogix's spec sheet]... *The device uses a Power PC 860DC (MPC860DC) processor running @ 40MHz *.. and has 2MB Flash and 4MB RAM (expandable to 16MB) *The wireless modules used can be the.. **Proxim RangeLAN FHSS radio **Lucent WaveLAN IEEE 802.11 2.4GHz DSSS radio **TRX7370 Enhanced Narrowband *The device may have multiple PCMCIA slots for multiple radios **Proxim 900MHz DSSS radio *Multiple antenna options are available *Weight: [[Weight::3.2kg]]
The sample SSID shown in the manual is '''TEKLOGIX'''. It may not be enabled by default.
